items.title: Government data stolen in hack, minister confirms
items.description: The trade minister says information was accessed and an investigation has been launched.

items.title: Trial date set for teen charged with girl's murder
items.description: A 15-year-old is accused of murdering nine-year-old Aria Thorpe.

items.title: Pope appoints new leader of Catholic Church in England and Wales
items.description: Richard Moth becomes Bishop of Westminster, succeeding Cardinal Vincent Nichols who is retiring.

items.title: Man City links '100% speculation', says Maresca
items.description: Reports suggesting Enzo Maresca is the potential successor to Pep Guardiola at Manchester City are "100% speculation", the Chelsea boss says.

items.title: Millions head home for Christmas on busiest day of festive getaway
items.description: Road, rail and air travellers are being advised to allow extra time for travel and check their routes.
